run.summary: Completed memory-evolution thread (21 sparks), prototyped and reverted --flip flag for dialectical spark mode, affirmed spark's value through apophatic essence-revealing, questioned reef's ongoing utility, globalized spark as plugin and skill, and committed all changes to both reef and claude-runtime repositories.

what-worked.item: Spark's apophatic pattern - revealing essence through negation across 21 sparks
Proper spark workflow enforcement (file → index → incubator chain)
--flip prototype validated concept even though output framing was reverted
Honest evaluation of reef's value vs overhead after extensive spark testing
Globalizing spark as both plugin and skill in plugin-registry.json
SQLite memory surfacing related past sparks effectively

what-didnt.item: --flip Hegelian synthesis framing felt prescriptive and hallucinatory
Bypassed spark documentation chain when testing manually (fixed)
Reef XML schema appears to be ceremonial overhead vs markdown simplicity

key-decisions.decision: Reef's core value is structured forgetting via selection pressure, not memory preservation
Spark methodology (5D combinatorics, swarm consensus, apophatic negation) is essential
--flip concept valid but synthesis framing was too heavy-handed
Spark documentation chain must be enforced (no raw output dumps to chat)
Reef XML schema may be ceremonial overhead; consider simplifying to markdown + hooks
Decay = not surfacing; glob attention window is selection pressure

next-session.item: Decide: archive reef XML schema or simplify to markdown + SessionStart hook
Prototype decay mechanism with attention tracking in glob surfacing
Evaluate spark as primary memory tool; reef as optional persistence layer
Revisit --flip with lighter touch (tier inversion only, no synthesis framing)
